title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repository providing the CLI and server to run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, usable in Node.js and browsers (via proxy).

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama, offering a simple API to chat, generate text, and embed with local models.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama models.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (now renamed ‘Open WebUI’) supporting chat, RAG, multimodal, and admin controls.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client for Ollama with Kotlin extensions and Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for chatting and generating text with local Ollama models.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Enhanced CLI wrapper around Ollama with prompts and utilities.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into the editor as a GitHub Copilot alternative.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models for RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Unofficial C# / .NET client for Ollama.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker image and compose examples for Ollama.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Template repository for building RAG apps with Ollama and Chroma.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that lets users chat with Ollama models in servers.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot integration for Ollama with streaming replies.

title: ollama-fastapi
summary: FastAPI service exposing Ollama with OpenAI-compatible endpoints.

title: ollama-terraform
summary: Terraform module to provision Ollama on AWS EC2 with GPU.

title: ollama-macos-swift
summary: SwiftUI Mac app that wraps Ollama for native UI interactions.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing an async client for Ollama.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration letting you use Ollama models as LLM, chat, or embedding backends.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI that wraps Ollama with syntax highlighting and conversation management.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-ui
summary: Lightweight SvelteKit web interface for chatting with Ollama models, deployable via static build.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Cross-platform desktop GUI for Ollama built with Tauri and React.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration allowing Ollama models to be used as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-nestjs
summary: NestJS module that injects Ollama client as a provider with decorators and interceptors.

title: ollama-django
summary: Reusable Django app adding Ollama chat endpoints, admin UI, and async tasks via Celery.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal Retrieval-Augmented Generation template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models and switch personas.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that adds /ollama slash command for private or channel-based LLM conversations.

title: ollama-mistral-7b-rag
summary: Example repo fine-tuning Mistral-7b via Ollama for domain-specific RAG on legal documents.

title: awesome-ollama
summary: Curated list of tools, libraries, tutorials, and integrations in the Ollama ecosystem.
